entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lac Raglan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 03:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -31.8°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -37.5°C
Wind: SSE 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 35. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 35. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 30.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 46 in the evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
